Name: Informatica_Project_Management
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>Project Registration and Management</h2></contents></template><panelset type="custom" scroll=""><panels><panel width="60%"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents>Project Registration allows Informatica Partners to register projects and submit them for CSAT. Submitted projects and completed CSAT surveys impact partner levels. </br></br>The information we collect from the project registration and CSAT process allows Informatica to identify partners that are successful around specific products and market segments, and to ultimately recommend those partners to our customers and internal field.</contents></template></components></panel><panel width="40%"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="widget"><div class="pad-10 pad-left-20" ><h3>Need Project Support?</h3>
Our new professional services offerings give you the flexibility to engage Informatica Professional Services around specific components of your project. 
</br></br>

<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>MARKETING CAMPAIGNS</h2>

@font-face {
    font-family: FuturaPTB;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/FuturaStd-Book.otf);
}

@font-face {
    font-family: ArialPARC;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/Arial.ttf);
}

/* General Styling */

.nx-page .ui-widget, body .nx-page, .nx-page td {
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Page Titles */

.nx-pagetitle-maintitle .ui-widget {
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Buttons */

.nx-actionbutton {
    float: left;
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    -moz-border-radius: 3px;
}

.ui-button, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default{
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 12pt !important;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
}
.ui-button .ui-button-text{
    line-height: 41px;
}
.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-button-text{
    padding-left: 23px;
}

.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-icon{
    margin-top: -8px;
}

.ui-button.ui-state-hover, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default:hover{
    color: black;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary{
    color: #254EA2;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary.ui-state-hover{
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
    color: #254EA2;
    background: #eee;
}

.nx-actionselect {
    background: #254EA2;
    cursor: pointer;
    white-space: nowrap;
    position: relative;
    color: #FFF;
    border-radius: 3px;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    margin: 0 4px 7px 0;
    border:none;
    box-shadow:none;
    line-height: 41px;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.nx-actionselect.nx-conditiontoken:hover{
    background: #FFD400;
    color: black;
}

.nx-actionselect:hover, .nx-actionbutton:hover {
    color: #000;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.nx-actionselect.unavailable:hover, .nx-actionbutton.unavailable:hover {
    color: white;
    background: #ddd;
    cursor: default;
}

/* Dropdown */
.nx-actionselect-dropdown{
  background: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
}
.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item {
  background: #254EA2;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #446AB8;
  color: white;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
  opacity: 1;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:first-child {
  border-top-right-radius: 3px;
  border-top-left-radius: 3px;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:last-child {
  border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom: none;
}


/* Tables */

table.nx-skootable-data {
    border-collapse:separate;
}

table.nx-skootable-data th {
    background: #939598;
    height:45px;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: lighter;
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    text-align:left;
    padding-left:10px;
    padding-right:10px;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody td, table.nx-skootable-data thead td {
    border-bottom: 1px solid white;
    height: 45px;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    background: #F0F0F0;
    vertical-align: middle;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
}

table.nx-skootable-data a {
    font-size: 13pt;
    color:#254EA2;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr td:nth-child(odd) {
    background-color:#F9F9F9
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr:nth-child(odd) td:nth-child(even) {
  background-color: #F0F0F0;
}

table.nx-skootable-data .nx-skootable-order-icon{
    margin-top: 3px;
    background: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    width: 13px;
}
table .nx-skootable-order-number{
    display: none !important;
}

.nx-list-footer select {
    width:auto;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

.nx-list-footer {
    background:transparent;
}

.nx-list-footer .ui-button.ui-state-hover {
    background:#254EA2;
    color:white;
}
/* Table Search */

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox {
  width: 180px;
  font-size: 12pt;
  border: 1px solid #aaa;
  margin: 0 0 7px;
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
  line-height: 41px;
  height: 50px;
  background: #f5f5f5;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:disabled {
    background: #ddd;
    opacity: .6;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox::-webkit-input-placeholder {
   font-size: 12pt;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 18- */
   font-size: 12pt; 
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox::-moz-placeholder {  /* Firefox 19+ */
   font-size: 12pt;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:-ms-input-placeholder {  
   font-size: 12pt;
}

/* Field Editors */

.nx-basicfieldeditor-section-header {
  padding: 8px;
  border-bottom: none;
  font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16pt;
  font-weight: 400;
  color: #939598;
}

/* Tabs */
.ui-tabs{
    background: none;
}
.ui-tabs-nav{
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    
}
.nx-lefttabs>.ui-tabs-nav, .nx-righttabs>.ui-tabs-nav{
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 3px 0px #aaa;
}
.nx-lefttabs>.ui-tabs-nav li a  .nx-template{
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: 10pt;
    line-height: normal;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav .ui-tabs-anchor{
    width: 100%;
    padding: 7px 12px;
    white-space: normal;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active, .ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-hover{
    background: #f1f1f1;
    margin-bottom: 0px;
    padding-bottom: 0px;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active a, .ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-hover a{
    color: black;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li{
    background: white;
    border-right:none;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-state-hover{
    background: #eee;
}
/* Forms */
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label.nx-layout-above{
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #939598;
    line-height: 22pt;
    font-weight: 400;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-columngroup {
    background: none;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor{
    background: none;
    padding: 10px;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-section{
    background: none;
    margin: 10px;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item{
    border-bottom: none;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor .nx-field input:not([type]){
    height: 25px;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}
.nx-editor .nx-basicfieldeditor-item select{
    max-width: none;
    height: 26px;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}
.nx-field input, .nx-field textarea, .nx-field select{
    background: white;
    border-color: #ddd;
    border-radius: 3px;
}

/* Wizard */
.nx-wizard .nx-editor-header-title{
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Multiselect */
.ui-multiselect-checkboxes label input{
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 3px;
}

button.ui-multiselect.ui-widget.ui-state-default {
  background: #254EA2;
  color: white;
  border-radius: 3px;
  border: none;
  min-height: 50px;
  font-size: 12pt;
  line-height: 41px;
}

button.ui-multiselect.ui-state-default:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
}

.ui-multiselect-header.ui-widget-header{
    background: #254EA2;
    font-size: 13pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    border: none;
    padding: 8px 3px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header ul li:nth-child(1) {
  margin-left: 9px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header ul li:nth-child(2) {
  margin-left: 10px;
}
.ui-multiselect-menu.ui-widget-content{
    padding: 3px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-circle-close{
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon{
    position: relative;
    top: 1px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-closethick, .ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-check{
    margin-right: 2px;
}
.ui-multiselect-menu.ui-widget-content {
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);
}
.ui-multiselect-checkboxes{
    overflow-y: auto;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Callout Box */
.nx-page .callout-box{
    background: #254EA2;
    padding: 30px;
    color: white;

Name: Marketing/Funds
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>INFORM PARTNER ENABLEMENT AND EXECUTION FUNDS PROGRAM</h2></contents></template><panelset type="custom" scroll=""><panels><panel width="570"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><p>The Informatica Partner Enablement and Execution Funds Program is an
attractive and competitive program that supports our INFORM Partners’
success in today’s competitive environment. Informatica is redesigning
the program for greater clarity and accessibility and automating it to
provide you with greater management and reporting capabilities.
The program consists of two funds, which are designed to support a
broad range of partner enablement, demand generation, and sales
development activities:</p></br></contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h3>PERFORMANCE-BASED FUNDS</h3>
<p>The <strong>Partner Referral and Assist Fund</strong> compensates partners when
they source (referral) or assist a deal. <a href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068G0000002FyFqIAK">Download the data sheet</a> for additional information on this fund.</p>
<p>The <strong>Partner Co-op Development Fund</strong> supplies partners program credits
when they resell Informatica solutions. <a href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068G0000002FyFvIAK">Download the data sheet</a> for additional information on this fund.</p></ul></br></contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents></br><a class="btn" href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068G0000001vJ7WIAU">FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS</a></contents></template></components></panel><panel width="310"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="callout-box"><p>Users who administer funds for their company may now access the new INFORM Partner Funds Portal. </p>
<a class="btn external" href="https://infapassport.okta.com/home/informaticapassport_informpartnerfunds_1/0oa12ims1pygbczfr1d8/55679">Access Portal</a></div></contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="widget"><div class="pad-10 pad-left-20" ><p>Coming soon: Enabling our partners to make a difference in their local communities by using their funds to donate to a charity through The INFORM Partner Giving Program.</br></br>
 
To kick start the program, we have donated to charity: water on your behalf. Our donation is funding a water filter for a school in Nepal, serving 300 people. Charity: water is working with their local partner, Splash, to provide lifesaving clean water, and hygiene services to nearly 70% of public school children in Nepal’s capital.
 </br></br>
<a href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068G0000002Fyi9IAC">Download the charity: water Nepal project details</a> and check back for progress updates!</p></div></div></contents></template></components></panel></panels></panelset></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url=""/></css></resources></skuidpage>

Name: Marketing/Resources/Events
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models><model id="NewModel" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="Account"><fields/><conditions/><actions/></model></models><components><template multiple="true" model="NewModel" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>EVENTS</h2></contents></template><panelset type="custom" scroll="" cssclass=""><panels><panel width="550"><components><template multiple="true" model="NewModel" allowhtml="true"><contents></br>
<h3>SPONSOR & CO-MARKET OPPORTUNITIES</h3>
<p>Informatica offers a number of opportunities for partners to participate, sponsor, and co-market throughout the course of the year. Our events calendar consists of partner and end user activities.</p>
<p><a href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068G0000001mVvuIAE">Download our 2016 Global Sponsorship Prospectus</a> for a summary of events & sponsorship opportunities</p>
</br>
<h3>ANNUAL INFORMATICA HOSTED EVENTS</h3>
<p>Annual Informatica-hosted events of particular interest to our partners include:</p>
<strong>Partner Summit/ Forum - Worldwide & Regional</strong></br>
<i>Worldwide Annual Partner Summit</i>
<p>This annual networking, enablement, and business development event is designed specifically to help boost your Informatica investment and generate increased sales opportunities. As an attending partner, your organization is listed in the Partner Profile booklet that is handed out to our global sales organization.</p>
<i>Regional Summits, Forums</i>
<p>These regionally based and focused events provide partners with the opportunity to hear from regional and global executives on our plans, products, and resources for partners.</p>
<strong>Informatica World</strong>
<p>This annual customer focused event offers education, training, and networking for our customers and partners. Learn more at
<a href="http://www.informaticaworld.com" target="_blank">www.informaticaworld.com</a>. Partners find value in sponsoring this event, for exposure to both the Informatica executive and sales teams, as well as end-user customers.</p>
<p>To discover more about sponsorship opportunities, contact your local partner marketing professional.</p></contents></template></components></panel><panel width="360" cssclass="forum"><components><template multiple="true" model="NewModel" allowhtml="true" cssclass="forum"><contents></br><h3>PARTNER FORUM PRESENTATIONS</h3><p>Presentations from Partner Forum 2016 are now available!</p>
<a class="btn" href="Partner_Forum_2016">View Presentations</a></contents></template></components></panel></panels></panelset></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url=""/><cssitem location="inline" name="forum" cachelocation="false">.forum .nx-template
{
    margin: 0px;
}

.forumbtn .btn
{
    background: #254EA2;
    border-radius: 3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 12pt;
    height: 40px;
    line-height: 11px;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    font-weight: normal;
}</cssitem></css></resources></skuidpage>

Name: Partner_Kickoff_EMEA_2016
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>Partner Kickoff EMEA 2016</h2></br>
We have compiled the presentations delivered at the 2016 EMEA Partner Kickoff Events:

<ul><li>Partner Kickoff United Kingdom – London, <em>February 9, 2016</em></li>
<li>Partner Kickoff Nordics/BeNeLux & France – Brussels, <em>February 10, 2016</em></li>
<li>Partner Kickoff Germany/Switzerland/Austria – Stuttgart, <em>February 12, 2016</em></li>
</ul></br>
Click the tab of the event location to view presentation summaries and access downloads:
</contents></template><tabset rememberlastusertab="true" defertabrendering="true" renderas=""><tabs><tab name="London Event"><components><template multiple="true" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="widget"><div class="pad-10 pad-left-20" ><h3>Kickoff United Kingdom - <em>London, February 9, 2016</em></h3>
Presentations from this event include:</br>
<ul><li><strong>Partner Success</strong> - Grant Allan</li>
<li><strong>Partnering with IPS</strong> - Oscar Rozario</li>
<li><strong>Master Data Management</strong> - Ian Cohen</li>

Name: Products/Technical-Information/Product-Support
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>PRODUCT SUPPORT</h2>
<p>All INFORM Partners have access to Informatica Network, our customer and partner support center.</p>
<p>The number of users that may register for MySupport depends on your partner level. If you have questions about who in your organization has been designated as MySupport administrators, please <a href="Contact_Us">contact us</a>.</p> 
<p>Informatica Network can be used to request technical support as well as access technical documentation on Informatica products. Resources available to you include:</p>
<ul><li><strong><a href="https://kb.informatica.com/KBExternal/Pages/Home.aspx">Knowledge Base</a></strong> - Storehouse of KB articles, product documentation, how-to libraries, and many more resources.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://network.informatica.com/community/informatica-network/informatica_expert_assistant">Informatica Expert Assistant</a></strong> - our most popular troubleshooting Wizard.</li>
<li><strong>Debugging Tools</strong> - free tools to help debug your environment faster.</li>
<li><strong><a href="https://network.informatica.com/support-videos.jspa">Support TV</a></strong> - Support videos on how to use our products, best practices, troubleshooting concepts for various Informatica products and platforms.</li>
<li><strong>Upgrade Planner</strong> - A multimedia tutorial to help you upgrade Informatica products from an older version.</li>
<li><strong>SupportFlash</strong> - An archive of monthly support newsletter sent to Informatica Customer.</li>
</ul></br>
<p>For further information on the Support resources please see the <a href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068G0000001vzg9IAA">Partner Support Orientation document</a>.</p>
<a class="btn" href="https://mysupport.informatica.com/login/login.html" target="_blank">Access Informatica Network</a></contents></template></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="false">
@font-face {
    font-family: FuturaPTB;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/FuturaStd-Book.otf);
}

@font-face {
    font-family: ArialPARC;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/Arial.ttf);
}

/* General Styling */

.nx-page .ui-widget, body .nx-page, .nx-page td {
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Page Titles */

.nx-pagetitle-maintitle .ui-widget {
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Buttons */

.nx-actionbutton {
    float: left;
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    -moz-border-radius: 3px;
}

.ui-button, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default{
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 12pt !important;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
}
.ui-button .ui-button-text{
    line-height: 41px;
}
.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-button-text{
    padding-left: 23px;
}

.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-icon{
    margin-top: -8px;
}

.ui-button.ui-state-hover, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default:hover{
    color: black;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary{
    color: #254EA2;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary.ui-state-hover{
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
    color: #254EA2;
    background: #eee;
}

.nx-actionselect {
    background: #254EA2;
    cursor: pointer;
    white-space: nowrap;
    position: relative;
    color: #FFF;
    border-radius: 3px;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    margin: 0 4px 7px 0;
    border:none;
    box-shadow:none;
    line-height: 41px;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.nx-actionselect.nx-conditiontoken:hover{
    background: #FFD400;
    color: black;
}

.nx-actionselect:hover, .nx-actionbutton:hover {
    color: #000;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.nx-actionselect.unavailable:hover, .nx-actionbutton.unavailable:hover {
    color: white;
    background: #ddd;
    cursor: default;
}

/* Dropdown */
.nx-actionselect-dropdown{
  background: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
}
.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item {
  background: #254EA2;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #446AB8;
  color: white;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
  opacity: 1;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:first-child {
  border-top-right-radius: 3px;
  border-top-left-radius: 3px;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:last-child {
  border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom: none;
}


/* Tables */

table.nx-skootable-data {
    border-collapse:separate;
}

table.nx-skootable-data th {
    background: #939598;
    height:45px;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: lighter;
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    text-align:left;
    padding-left:10px;
    padding-right:10px;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody td, table.nx-skootable-data thead td {
    border-bottom: 1px solid white;
    height: 45px;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    background: #F0F0F0;
    vertical-align: middle;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
}

table.nx-skootable-data a {
    font-size: 13pt;
    color:#254EA2;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr td:nth-child(odd) {
    background-color:#F9F9F9
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr:nth-child(odd) td:nth-child(even) {
  background-color: #F0F0F0;
}

table.nx-skootable-data .nx-skootable-order-icon{
    margin-top: 3px;
    background: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    width: 13px;
}
table .nx-skootable-order-number{
    display: none !important;
}

.nx-list-footer select {
    width:auto;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

.nx-list-footer {
    background:transparent;
}

.nx-list-footer .ui-button.ui-state-hover {
    background:#254EA2;
    color:white;
}
/* Table Search */

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox {
  width: 180px;
  font-size: 12pt;
  border: 1px solid #aaa;
  margin: 0 0 7px;
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
  line-height: 41px;
  height: 50px;
  background: #f5f5f5;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:disabled {
    background: #ddd;
    opacity: .6;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox::-webkit-input-placeholder {
   font-size: 12pt;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 18- */
   font-size: 12pt; 
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox::-moz-placeholder {  /* Firefox 19+ */
   font-size: 12pt;
}

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox:-ms-input-placeholder {  
   font-size: 12pt;
}

/* Field Editors */

.nx-basicfieldeditor-section-header {
  padding: 8px;
  border-bottom: none;
  font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16pt;
  font-weight: 400;
  color: #939598;
}

/* Tabs */
.ui-tabs{
    background: none;
}
.ui-tabs-nav{
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
}
.nx-lefttabs>.ui-tabs-nav li a{
    font-size: 12pt;    
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav .ui-tabs-anchor{
    width: 100%;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active, .ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-hover{
    background: #FFD400;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active a, .ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-active.ui-state-hover a{
    color: black;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li{
    background: #254EA2;
    border-right:none;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-state-hover{
    background: #2A58B8;
}

.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li:first-child{
    border-top-left-radius: 3px;
    border-top-right-radius: 3px;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li:last-child{
    border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
}
.new-registration.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li:nth-last-child(2){
    border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
}
/* Forms */
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label.nx-layout-above{
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #939598;
    line-height: 22pt;
    font-weight: 400;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-columngroup {
    background: none;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor{
    background: none;
    padding: 10px;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-section{
    background: none;
    margin: 10px;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item{
    border-bottom: none;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor .nx-field input:not([type]){
    height: 25px;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}
.nx-editor .nx-basicfieldeditor-item select{
    max-width: none;
    height: 26px;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}
.nx-field input, .nx-field textarea, .nx-field select{
    background: white;
    border-color: #ddd;
    border-radius: 3px;
}

/* Wizard */
.nx-wizard .nx-editor-header-title{
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Multiselect */
.ui-multiselect-checkboxes label input{
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 3px;
}

button.ui-multiselect.ui-widget.ui-state-default {
  background: #254EA2;
  color: white;
  border-radius: 3px;
  border: none;
  min-height: 50px;
  font-size: 12pt;
  line-height: 41px;
}

button.ui-multiselect.ui-state-default:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
}

.ui-multiselect-header.ui-widget-header{
    background: #254EA2;
    font-size: 13pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    border: none;
    padding: 8px 3px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header ul li:nth-child(1) {
  margin-left: 9px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header ul li:nth-child(2) {
  margin-left: 10px;
}
.ui-multiselect-menu.ui-widget-content{
    padding: 3px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-circle-close{
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon{
    position: relative;
    top: 1px;
}
.ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-closethick, .ui-multiselect-header .ui-icon-check{
    margin-right: 2px;
}
.ui-multiselect-menu.ui-widget-content {
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3);
}
.ui-multiselect-checkboxes{
    overflow-y: auto;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Callout Box */
.nx-page .callout-box{
    background: #254EA2;
    padding: 30px;
    color: white;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
    margin-bottom: 35px;
}
.nx-page .callout-box h2{
    font-weight: 400;
    color: white;
    font-size: 16pt;
}
.nx-page .callout-box .btn{
    background: #FFD400;
    color: black;
}
.nx-page .callout-box ul{
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
.nx-template{
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
    margin: 10px;
}

/* General html */
.nx-page h1, .nx-page h2{
    font-weight: 400;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    color: #939598;
}

.nx-template .btn{
    background: #254EA2;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 13pt;
    height: 50px;
    line-height: 23px;
}
.nx-template{
    color: #6d6f71;
    font-size: 13pt;
    line-height: 18pt;

<ul><a href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068G0000001miJoIAI"><b>Channel Bundle Overview</b></a> - Download the guide to selling Channel Bundles and the resources available to support you</br>
 <a href="https://informaticameeting.webex.com/informaticameeting/lsr.php?RCID=81b843030b474255b30a5d53767e3b04" target="_blank"><b>Channel Bundle Overview Webcast</b></a> - Listen to a recording summarizing the Channel Bundle offerings
 </br>
<a href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068G0000001miK3IAI"><b>Frequently Asked Questions</b></a> - Download our FAQ for common inquiries around the bundles</br>
<a href="Marketing_Campaigns"><b>Marketing Campaigns</b></a> - Access campaigns available for you to start marketing the bundles today</p></ul>
</div></div></contents></template><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>PRESALES AND SALES TRAINING</h2>
<p>Informatica offers partners complimentary access to the curriculum our own salesforce and sales consultants take to gain competency in selling, demonstrating and helping present the benefits to customers of Informatica products. Similar to Informatica Sales Training but with more of a deep dive on products, this three-part sales training series covers the whole sales cycle from identify and qualify (available now), position and present, through close.</br></br>
<a class="btn" href="Training">ACCESS TRAINING</a></p></br></contents></template></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url=""/></css></resources></skuidpage>

skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models><model id="DummyModel" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="Product_Request__c"><fields/><conditions><condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" state=""/></conditions><actions/></model></models><components><panelset type="custom" scroll="" cssclass="certification"><panels><panel width="50%"><components><template multiple="true" model="DummyModel" allowhtml="true"><contents><p>Critical to being a successful Informatica partner is a thorough understanding of our product portfolio. INFORM Partners have available to them a comprehensive set of sales and technical courseware that will enable them to effectively promote, sell, and deploy Informatica solutions. In addition to product courseware, we offer partners sales and technical sales training and certification on our leading technologies.</p>
<p>INFORM Partners are required to achieve certification on one or more of our products on an annual basis. Please refer to the INFORM Program Guide for specifics on the certification requirements.</p>
<p>To take advantage of the exponential market growth expected in areas such as Analytics, Total Customer Relationship, Application Consolidation, Cloud Modernization and Data Governance, Partners must have trained and competent employees who can position and promote Informatica’s solutions.</p></contents></template></components></panel><panel width="50%"><components><template multiple="false" model="DummyModel" allowhtml="true"><contents><div class="callout-box">
	<h2>NEW PARTNER CERTIFICATION PACKAGES!</h2><br/>
<p>Informatica now offers all INFORM Partners aggressively priced certification packages through the Certify Now initiative.</p>
	<a class="btn" href="Partner_Certification">LEARN MORE</a>
</div></contents></template></components></panel></panels></panelset><panelset type="custom" scroll="" cssclass="training-resource"><panels><panel width="100%"><components><panelset type="custom" scroll=""><panels><panel width="33.3%"><components><template multiple="false" model="DummyModel" allowhtml="true"><contents><strong><a href="Sales_Training">SALES</a></strong></br></br><p>Sales  identifies and generates revenue opportunities and is the primary interface between your company and Informatica customers.  Sales articulates the value proposition of  Informatica products and solutions. Sales:</p>
<ul><li>Develops joint solution offerings and go to market strategies</li>
<li>Articulates customers’ business model, identifying all key players</li>
<li>Ensures customer readiness</li></ul></br></contents></template></components></panel><panel width="33.3%"><components><template multiple="true" model="DummyModel" allowhtml="true" cssclass=""><contents><strong><a href="Presales_Training">TECHNICAL SALES</a></strong></br></br>
<p>Presales is a technical and collaborative role that works with other members of the presales team to address the technical needs of potential customers and to close new business deals from sales leads.  As the subject matter expert, Presales will:</p><ul><li>Translate clients’ business challenges and concerns into a solution oriented discussion.</li>
<li>Counsel customers on the capabilities of our products and solutions.</li>
<li>Provide advice and guidance to coworkers.</li>
<li>Train your team.</li>
<li>Influence and effect business outcomes.</li></ul></contents></template></components></panel><panel width="33.3%"><components><template multiple="true" model="DummyModel" allowhtml="true" cssclass=""><contents><strong><a href="Product_Training">IMPLEMENTATION</a></strong></br></br>
<p>Implementation provides a systematic and structured approach to effectively integrate Informatica’s technologies and solutions.  This role is critical to the post-sale processes ensuring the solution is operating properly in its environment, including analyzing requirements, installation, configuration, customization, systems integration, and support.</p>

</contents></template></components></panel></panels></panelset></components></panel></panels></panelset></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url="">
@font-face {
    font-family: FuturaPTB;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/FuturaStd-Book.otf);
}

@font-face {
    font-family: ArialPARC;
    src: url(/resource/PARC_fonts/Arial.ttf);
}

/* General Styling */

.nx-page .ui-widget, body .nx-page, .nx-page td {
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

/* Page Titles */

.nx-pagetitle-maintitle .ui-widget {
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 16pt;
    color: #6d6f71;
}

/* Buttons */

.nx-actionbutton {
    float: left;
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
    -moz-border-radius: 3px;
}

.ui-button, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default{
    background: #254EA2;
    margin: 0 6px 5px 0;
    border-radius:3px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 12pt !important;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
}
.ui-button .ui-button-text{
    line-height: 41px;
}
.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-button-text{
    padding-left: 23px;
}

.ui-button-text-icon-primary .ui-icon{
    margin-top: -8px;
}

.ui-button.ui-state-hover, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default:hover{
    color: black;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary{
    color: #254EA2;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
}

.ui-button.nx-button-secondary.ui-state-hover{
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #254EA2 inset;
    border-color: #254EA2;
    color: #254EA2;
    background: #eee;
}

.nx-actionselect {
    background: #254EA2;
    cursor: pointer;
    white-space: nowrap;
    position: relative;
    color: #FFF;
    border-radius: 3px;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 12pt;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    margin: 0 4px 7px 0;
    border:none;
    box-shadow:none;
    line-height: 41px;
    height: 50px;
    padding: 0px 10px;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.nx-actionselect.nx-conditiontoken:hover{
    background: #FFD400;
    color: black;
}

.nx-actionselect:hover, .nx-actionbutton:hover {
    color: #000;
    background: #FFD400;
}

.nx-actionselect.unavailable:hover, .nx-actionbutton.unavailable:hover {
    color: white;
    background: #ddd;
    cursor: default;
}

/* Dropdown */
.nx-actionselect-dropdown{
  background: none;
  border-radius: 3px;
}
.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item {
  background: #254EA2;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #446AB8;
  color: white;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:hover {
  background: #FFD400;
  color: black;
  opacity: 1;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:first-child {
  border-top-right-radius: 3px;
  border-top-left-radius: 3px;
}

.nx-actionselect-dropdown>.nx-actionselect-dropdown-item:last-child {
  border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom: none;
}


/* Tables */

table.nx-skootable-data {
    border-collapse:separate;
}

table.nx-skootable-data th {
    background: #939598;
    height:45px;
    font-family: FuturaPTB, sans-serif;
    font-weight: lighter;
    font-size: 13pt;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    text-align:left;
    padding-left:10px;
    padding-right:10px;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody td, table.nx-skootable-data thead td {
    border-bottom: 1px solid white;
    height: 45px;
    border-right: 1px solid white;
    background: #F0F0F0;
    vertical-align: middle;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13pt;
}

table.nx-skootable-data a {
    font-size: 13pt;
    color:#254EA2;
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr td:nth-child(odd) {
    background-color:#F9F9F9
}

table.nx-skootable-data tbody tr:nth-child(odd) td:nth-child(even) {
  background-color: #F0F0F0;
}

table.nx-skootable-data .nx-skootable-order-icon{
    margin-top: 3px;
    background: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    width: 13px;
}
table .nx-skootable-order-number{
    display: none !important;
}

.nx-list-footer select {
    width:auto;
    font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
}

.nx-list-footer {
    background:transparent;
}

.nx-list-footer .ui-button.ui-state-hover {
    background:#254EA2;
    color:white;
}
/* Table Search */

.nx-editor-header input.searchbox {
  width: 180px;
  font-size: 12pt;
  border: 1px solid #aaa;
  margin: 0 0 7px;
  font-family: ArialPARC, sans-serif;
  line-height: 41px;
  height: 50px;
  background: #f5f5f5;

Name: Training/Credentials/Certification
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true" theme="Modern"><models/><components><panelset type="vertical"><panels><panel width="225"><components><template multiple="true" model="" allowhtml="true" cssclass=""><contents><h2>CERTIFICATION</h2>
<p>Informatica requires all INFORM Partners to have a number of their professionals certified on the Informatica products they intend to promote. Certification requirements vary depending on partner level  - <a href="Training_Requirements">click here for requirements</a>.</p>
<p>Courseware in any of the certification packages is available 24x7, which enables the employee to take it at any time, based on their schedule. Virtual training reduces the time and expense incurred when away from the office. The aggressive pricing for these packages will reduce your quarterly and annual training expenses. Achieving certification on PowerCenter, MDM, or any of the other offered packages demonstrates competency within the partner practice - valued by your target customers.</p>

<p> The Certify Now offers certification at an aggressive price, to enable partners to have more of their staff certified on Informatica offerings. Every package includes the courseware, lab time, and the exam for achieving certification. We currently offer seven certifications, with more under development and planned for in the coming months.</p></contents></template></components></panel><panel><components><panelset type="vertical"><panels><panel width="225"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>LIST OF CERTIFICATION PACKAGES:</h2></br></contents></template><tabset rememberlastusertab="true" defertabrendering="true" renderas="lefttabs" cssclass=""><tabs><tab name="PowerCenter Developer"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h3>Certification Package Description:</h3>
<p><b>PowerCenter 9.x: Developer, Level 1 </b></br> 
Students are introduced to Informatica PowerCenter 9.x through a series of 16 onDemand modules and 40 hours of lab exercises. Develop cleansing, formatting, sorting, and aggregating procedures. This course will cover various types of lookups, such as cached, persistent, and multiple row returns.</p>
<p><b>PowerCenter 9.x: Developer, Level 2</b></br>
Through a series of 13 onDemand modules and 20 hours of labs, review advanced topics to compliment and extend the Level 1 class. Advanced topics include:
<ul><li>High Availability</li>
<li>Pipeline Look-up & Dynamic Look-up Expressions</li>
<li>SQL Transformation & Transaction Control Transformations</li></li></ul></p>
<p><b>PowerCenter Data Integration 9.x: Developer, Specialist
Certification</b></br> 
This exam measures your competency as a team member on a standard
project implementation. You should be able to import sources, targets and
lookups, put together slowly changing dimension mappings to incorporate
best practices, craft reusable transformations and mapplets, incorporate
reusability using shortcuts, be able to use the debugger to competently debug
a mapping with or without a prebuilt session and workflow, and execute and
monitor the session and workflow.</p>
</p><a class="btn" href="https://informatica.csod.com/lms/LoDetails/DetailsLo.aspx?loid=2759cbf4-d1fe-4bbb-bfbd-68a48ad7521a#t=1" target="_blank">REGISTER</a>
</contents></template></components><renderconditions logictype="and"/></tab><tab name=" PowerCenter Administrator" loadlazypanels="true"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h3>Certification Package Description:</h3>
<p><b>PowerCenter 9.x: Administration </b></br> 
In this course, students will learn to administer the PowerCenter platform. The course is intended for either PowerCenter administrators with one year or more of professional experience, or those who have attended previous Informatica Level 1 Developer training classes.</p>
<p><b>PowerCenter Data Integration 9.x: Administrator, Specialist
Certification</b></br> 
This exam measures your competency across installation and configuration,
transformations, and Velocity best practices as a full member on a standard
project implementation on the skills and capabilities listed in the skill set
inventory. The skill set inventory is used to guide your preparation before
taking the exam. It is an outline of the technical topics and subject areas that
are covered in each exam. The skill set inventory includes test domain
weighting, test objectives and topical content. The topics and concepts are
included to clarify the test objectives.</p>
<a class="btn" href="https://informatica.csod.com/lms/LoDetails/DetailsLo.aspx?loid=38480db9-0505-47d6-90e6-44d594b40580" target="_blank">REGISTER</a>

</contents></template></components></tab><tab name=" Data Quality Developer" loadlazypanels="true"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h3>Certification Package Description:</h3>
<p><b>Data Quality 9.x: Developer</b></br> 
Informatica Developer is a thick client workbench tool that developers can use to profile, cleanse, standardize, de-duplicate, and consolidate data in the enterprise.</p>
<p>This is an introductory course to the Data Quality 9.x Developer Tool, providing users with a high level overview of the Data Quality Process, setting a foundation for the processes that follow. This course is taught through a series of 16 onDemand modules and 40 hours of lab</p>
<p><b>Data Quality 9.x: Analyst</b></br> 
Informatica Analyst is a web-based application client that analysts can use to analyze, profile, and score data in an enterprise. Students are introduced to the Data Quality 9.x Analyst tool through a series of 5 onDemand modules and 20 hours of lab exercises.</p>
<p><b>Data Quality 9.x: Developer, Level 2 onDemand</b></br> 
A course designed for Developers who have previously completed the Informatica Data Quality Level 1 course and are more experienced. This is a continuation of the Level 1 course, focusing in more detail topics such as building Classifier and NER models, Parsing, Matching, AV settings, Human Tasks, and Workflows. Additional topics include Association, Parameters, and DQ for Excel.</p>
<p><b>Data Quality 9.x: Developer, Specialist Certification</b></br> 
This exam measures your competency as a team member on a standard
project implementation. You should be able to explain and describe data
quality transformations; be able to build, debug, and execute mappings; and
be able to integrate mappings into Power Center.</p>
<a class="btn" href="https://informatica.csod.com/lms/LoDetails/DetailsLo.aspx?loid=9d2711dd-6e16-4bf4-b41a-a3c34ebae211#t=1" target="_blank">REGISTER</a></contents></template></components></tab><tab name="MDM Hub Developer" loadlazypanels="true"><components><template multiple="false" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h3>Certification Package Description:</h3><p><b>MDM 9.x Multidomain Edition: Configuration</b></br> 
This course provides students with the knowledge and skills necessary to configure a data model and business rules in Informatica MDM Multidomain Edition (MDM Hub) for a given data model and business rules design. The course provides extensive hands-on labs and exercises to allow students to gain confidence in the use of the MDM console.</p>
<p><b>MDM Data Director 9.x: Configuration</b></br> 
This course provides configuration specialists with the essential concepts to understand what goes into a BDD implementation, introducing them to the fundamental capabilities of the BDD user interface. It also teaches them how to build BDD applications and customize the BDD interface.</p>
<p><b>MDM Hub 9.x: Developer, Specialist Certification Exam</b></br> 
This exam measures your competency as a member of a project implementation team. You should be able to explain and identify the MDM product architecture, and to configure its main components including cleanse engine, match server, hierarchy manager, data governance tools and workflows.  Once the specialist exam is successfully passed, individual is awarded the Informatica Master Data Management Developer certification badge.</p>
<a class="btn" href="https://informatica.csod.com/lms/LoDetails/DetailsLo.aspx?loid=924da8b7-3d56-4042-b12a-fac401817702#t=1" target="_blank">REGISTER</a></contents></template></components></tab></tabs></tabset></components></panel><panel><components/></panel></panels></panelset></components></panel></panels></panelset></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url="">

Name: Training/Focus-Areas/Support
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true"><models/><components><template multiple="true" model="" allowhtml="true"><contents><h2>SUPPORT TRAINING</h2>
<p>Informatica Global Customer Support provides customers with world class technical support to ensure successful implementation of their business solutions by using Informatica products. For ten consecutive years, Informatica Global Customer Support received top marks in Customer Loyalty.</p> 
<p>Partners that provide first tier support to our customers are required to complete the relevant product Support enablement. </p>
<p>The Support Enablement documents provide troubleshooting tips, useful support tools, a list of key tasks to complete before opening a Support Case and links to the relevant product documentation and How To Libraries (H2L). </p><p>
<strong>Partner Support Orientation</strong></br>
<a href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068G0000001vzg9IAA">Partner Support Orientation</a> - An introduction to the resources available from Informatica Support for partners.</p>
<p><strong>PowerCenter</strong></br><a href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068G0000001vzfkIAA">PowerCenter Support Enablement</a></p>
<p><strong>MDM</strong></br><a href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068G0000001vzfaIAA">MDM Support Enablement</a></p>
<p><strong>Data Quality</strong></br><a href="/partners/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/download/068G0000001vzfGIAQ">Data Quality Support Enablement</a></p></contents></template></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="MasterCSS" cachelocation="true" url=""/></css></resources></skuidpage>

this deal registration, I acknowledge and agree to the terms of the Informatica Partner Program.  Referral Benefit eligibility is based on partner legal agreement type. A current INFORM Partner Program agreement must be executed to be eligible for program referral benefits. All benefits awarded are per the then current INFORM Partner Program Guide and the terms and conditions below: </contents></template><panelset type="standard" scroll="fixed" height="300"><panels><panel><components><template multiple="false" model="Registrations" allowhtml="false"><contents>Referral Benefit Terms:
1. Partner’s participation in the INFORM Partner Program’s referral benefits is subject to the conditions set forth in the INFORM Partner Program agreement and per the referral benefit table in the then current INFORM Partner Program Guide and/or Schedule.
2. All benefits are subject to Informatica’s validation of the Partner’s role and value in the opportunity.
3. Referral percentage amount rewarded and any applicable caps will be calculated against actual Informatica net license revenue and/or First Year Cloud ACV for the customer transaction order when booked by Informatica - less any applicable charges.
4. The Partner and the Informatica Alliance Manager/Representative are responsible for documenting teaming in sufficient detail to be considered for acceptance by Informatica Sales. 
5. The Teaming Arrangement must be approved by Informatica Field Sales and Partner prior to any opportunity closing to receive eligible benefits. Partner acceptance will be conducted via email. No eligibility or approvals for benefits will be considered after Informatica deal closure. 
6. Informatica may work with multiple Partners on any specific opportunity; referral benefits rewarded may be split accordingly based on Partner role and value-add contribution in closing the transaction. 
7. Benefits are only made available if the license transaction closes, the transaction remains booked, and after the customer pays Informatica for the license. 
8. In the event of any discrepancy, the applicable percentage calculated and/or caps will be those as originally forwarded by Informatica, and/or the terms of the then current INFORM Program Guide Benefits table prevail.
9. Partners engaging in any Federal, state, local or other tax-payer funded or related opportunities are ineligible to receive any fee or gratuity of any nature from Informatica. Partners engaging in these transactions may be eligible for participation/use of INFA development fund only. Benefit/ use of such fund(s) is restricted to credit(s) applied to specific training services and/or attendance at Informatica corporate business educational activities which are open to all INFORM Partners and/or receipt of Informatica IPS services for the sole benefit of the customer/client/ end user. Partner is required at all times to fully report and disclose and provide all required accountings to the applicable public sector customer/client of receipt of any such training, services or attendance at any such educational event. Partner will at all times fully indemnify and defend Informatica, its officers, agents, employees and directors against any and all fees, fines, costs, liens, judgments or expenses that any such person(s) may incur as a result of any violation of this provision”. 
10. Teaming Arrangements are valid for 12 months from acceptance date.</contents></template></components></panel></panels></panelset></components></panel></panels></panelset><pagetitle
